name: Disneys Kim Possible - Kimmunicator [NDS]
description:
Our favorite crime-fighting cheerleader is once again forced to deal
with her nemesis, Dr. Drakken, who this time has kidnapped our favorite
soda-swilling geek genius, Wade. Can you help Kim (and Rufus, our
favorite naked mole rat) go undercover to disable the bad doctor's
latest Doomsday Device and rescue Wade?

Features

• Join Kim as she busts out backflips, double jumps and roundhouse kicks
- all in brilliant 3D
• Crank up your Kimmunicator (using the stylus
and microphone) to employ stealthe, engage in combat, construct gadgets
and unscramble maps in 15 hair-raising levels
• Make like a naked
mole rat in a series of cool mini-games
